get.description: Retrieves a list of customers, optionally filtered by fields like parent ID, name, email, phone, and ID, with pagination support.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: after

parameters.name: before

parameters.name: created_by

parameters.description: ID of person who updated the event

Registers a new haircut event with the provided details from request body.
